mapper.insert:

id,
code,
use_count,
laser_code,
bind_type,
label_type,
is_del,
operator_code,
prev_operation,
prev_key,
unicode,
operator_name ) VALUES (
#{id},
#{code},
#{useCount},
#{laserCode},
#{bindType},
#{labelType},
#{isDel},
#{operatorCode},
#{prevOperation},
#{prevKey},

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rfid_container WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE rfid_container SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE rfid_container SET
code = #{code},
use_count = #{useCount},
laser_code = #{laserCode},
bind_type = #{bindType},
label_type = #{labelType},
is_del = #{isDel},
operator_code = #{operatorCode},
prev_operation = #{prevOperation},
prev_key = #{prevKey},
unicode = #{unicode},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
id = #{id} WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
